field.name: description
field.value:
Here is a validation contributor that allow declaring validators on properties for separated interfaces.
this is a partial implementation (to be extended) of http://support.castleproject.org/projects/COMP/issues/view/COMP-ISSUE-52

comment.author: gauthier
comment.text:
summary of changes for ValidatorContainerInterfaceValidationContributor.patch =============================================================================
design changes: - changed signature of IValidatorRegistry, IValidatorBuilder, AbstractValidationAttribute and CachedValidationRegistry : use IValidatorRunner instead of ValidatorRunner - moved public declaration of IDictionary ExtendedProperties { get ; } to IValidatorRunner - extracted most of validation logic into DefaultValidationPerformer which implement a new interface: IValidationPerformer (Law of Demeter friendly and will be used by not only validationrunner) - externalized PerformValidation and ExecuteContributors (if removed PerformValidation is a breaking change for anyone, we could provide accessor to IValidationPerformer instance) to IValidationPerformer - added dependency scheme to contributors : IHasValidationPerformerDependency, IHasValidatorRegistryDependency and IHasValidatorRunnerDependency - instanciation of default IValidationPerformer (not overridable at this time) in ValidatorRunner
fixes: - fixed issue in AbstractValidationContributor when using multiple contributors: the class did have a static list of initialized type which was shared for all inheritors - modified AccessorUtil to bypass IL emission if property belongs to an interface (can Craig Neuwirt help for a fix?) - refactored nested constructor calls in ValidatorRunner
features: - created ValidatorContainerInterfaceValidationContributor performing validation on IValidatorContainerInterface - added what allow implementation of COMP-ISSUE-52 (IFacetedValidationRunner will follow to bring the partial/usecase validation features)
